definition: Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The rain percolated through the roof.
And Louise holds a handful of rain.
The rain flowed into the low-lying land.
sentences.chinese: 雨水都順着山勢流到了塘坳裏。

sentences.english: It's more than just words: it's just tears and rain.
sentences.chinese: 多說無益，就讓眼淚和雨水來證明。

sentences.english: Peacock also is said to be able to foretell rain, and dances when rain is coming.
sentences.chinese: 據說孔雀能夠預知雨水，將要下雨的時候就會跳舞。

sentences.english: Ribbons of dunes trap the rains.
Wildebeests migrate in great herds across the Serengeti. The key to their mass movement is the rain.
sentences.chinese: 牛羚羣要橫穿塞倫蓋蒂進行大遷移，其關鍵是雨水。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 當水汽凝成雨水，會造成局域性的大氣壓力下降。

sentences.english: The roof let in the rain.
A string of rain water slides from leaf Xi and sets aside among two of us just.
sentences.chinese: 一串雨水從葉隙中滑落，恰好在我倆之間劃開。

sentences.english: The rich scent of rain and wet earth was blowing through the open window.
sentences.chinese: 雨水和溼土那厚重的味道透過敞開的窗子襲面而來。

sentences.english: Temperate rain forests get much of their water from moisture-laden ocean winds.
sentences.chinese: 溫帶雨林得到很多的它們的雨水從含水分的海洋風。

sentences.english: He splashed in the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 他在大雨下淌着雨水前進。

sentences.english: Let the rainwater run through this pipe.
sentences.chinese: 讓雨水從這個管道中流過去。

sentences.english: Rainwater on the mountain flows into the valley.
sentences.chinese: 山上的雨水全都彙集流進了山窪裏。

definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
